Package chess.interfaces

Interface IChessboard

All Known Subinterfaces:
IChessMatch
All Known Implementing Classes:
Chessboard, ChessMatch
public interface IChessboard
Represents a chessboard.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<IChessMove>
    generateMovesOf(int team)
    Generates moves for the entire team.
    List<IChessMove>

    Generates the moves a chess piece is capable of.

    Determines whether a chess piece is located on a square.

    Gets the king of the provided team.

    Generates the legal moves of a chess player.

    Generates the legal moves of a 'dice chess' player.

  • Method Details

    • generateMovesOf

      List<IChessMove> generateMovesOf(IChessPiece piece)
      Generates the moves a chess piece is capable of. Remark: Each direction the chess piece can move in, is independently stored. Meaning, the capability of moving 3 squares up and the capability of moving 2 squares right are separately from each other.
      Returns:
      A list containing all moves a chess piece is capable of.

    • generateMovesOf

      List<IChessMove> generateMovesOf(int team)
      Generates moves for the entire team.

    • get

      IChessPiece get(IChessboardSquare square)
      Determines whether a chess piece is located on a square. If so, then the chess piece is returned. Null, otherwise.

    • getKing

      IChessPiece getKing(int team)
      Gets the king of the provided team.

    • legalMovesOf

      List<IChessMove> legalMovesOf(int team)
      Generates the legal moves of a chess player.

    • legalMovesOf

      List<IChessMove> legalMovesOf(int team, char[] values)
      Generates the legal moves of a 'dice chess' player.

    • pieces

      List<IChessPiece> pieces()
      Gets all chess piece that are placed on the board.
      Returns:
      A list containing all active "black and white coloured" chess pieces.

    • playerIsCheckMated

      boolean playerIsCheckMated(int team)
      Determines whether a team is checkmated. Remark: Should only be called when there are no moves left.
